card.name: Supernova Bigbang Anastasis
card.text: ■ Galaxy Vortex evolution—Put on top of 3 of your Arc Seraphims, Dreammates, and/or Great Mecha Kings. ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may summon any number of creatures from among them For No Cost ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Ambitious Dragon
card.text: ■ This creature gets +2000 power for each of your Fire Birds in the battle zone. ■ While you have a Fire Bird in the battle zone, this creature has "double breaker".

card.name: Refrain Abyss, Blue Divine Dragon
card.text: ■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Terse Ruth, Lightboom Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever your opponent puts a card in your mana zone into your graveyard, you may return that card to your mana zone.

card.name: Skyrab, the Reckless Brat
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ End Step ■ Life Gate

card.name: Filler Robo Concurion
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose any number of cards in your opponent's graveyard and put them on the bottom of their deck in any order.
